snippet.title: Kagami: An Odyssey in Japanese Language Learning Trailer
snippet.description:
こんにちは! This is the trailer for our Japanese introductory Language Learning game, which is currently out on Steam in Early Access and is set to have it's official release on May 3rd 2024!

Here is the link to the Steam Page if your interested!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2340320/Kagami_An_Odyssey_in_Japanese_Language_Learning/

Thank you! ありがとう ございます!

#indiegame #kagamiGame #learnjapanese #kagamiJapaneseLearning #kagamiRPG
